website_summaries.verdict: Good quality yoga strap that comes in an assortment of cheerful colors to spruce up your home or studio practice.
pros: Comes in 6, 8, and 10-foot lengths, and 8 vibrant colors – the purple is particularly loved by reviewers
Great for restorative yoga classes and at-home practice and general stretching
cons: Not as thick as competing or studio straps, and some reviewers found this one too thin and flimsy for practice

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the wait
customer_reviews.text: It's a yoga strap. It works. Nice color. What I'm mad (at myself) about is that I didn't realize that it ships from China. It took several weeks to get here. I ended up buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Sandypants

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy Unless You Have Low Standards
customer_reviews.text: The color is NOTHING like what is pictured! I thought I would get this beautiful sea-foam/aqua blue color and instead it's some ugly, very different blue. The material it's made from is weird. It thinner and seems to crease very easy when using it...not sure how long it will last. I thought about sending it back, but then I decided to suck it up and use the ugly, crappy thing until it does break and then get a pretty, high-quality one from some other reputable brand.
customer_reviews.author: Shana L. Kuehn

customer_reviews.title: NOT "Durable Cotton"
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these 10 ft. straps. I specifically decided of these straps instead of one of the many similar ones available from other companies because it was declared to be "durable cotton". It also looked in the picture to be thick soft woven cotton that would be comfortable to use. When they arrived I was very disappointed to see "polyester cotton" on the packaging. The straps are thin and flimsy feeling. They work well enough that I will keep them because I don't want to deal with returning them. I don't appreciate the deception on the product description and I do not plan to order any other Reehut products.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great for class and home
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my restorative yoga class and to use at home. It came in a nice reclosable clear packaging. Love the color deep purple. Very vibrant. It also comes with a card with their facebook,Twitter and their Instagram page. I am 5 ft 5 and I received the 8 ft strap. I am sure I could have went to the 6ft. However rather too long then to short. Just wrap around hands. It is nice and strong. I have only used a couple of times. I will give you a update later.
customer_reviews.author: bjjoggs

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could find a 12 foot Strap
customer_reviews.text: I am a barrel-chested man, NO, not FAT, just big. I wanted the strap to do help adjust and stretch my upper trapezial muscles. I would have like a 12-foot strap but could not find one. This on just barely makes it around my back, over my shoulders, crisscrossed and back around the front. This pulls down on the shoulder and softens the upper trap. But, it is very good quality and I managed to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: billhigh67

customer_reviews.title: Strong Yoga Strap: many uses
customer_reviews.text: The Reehut Yoga Strap is so useful for me. I used to use one to get into yoga postures when I was young. Now that I'm a lot older, I sometimes have trouble picking up my foot to put on my socks and shoes. This is what I use it for now. In the future, I hope to use it for stretching my arms behind my back after my shoulder surgery and stretching my legs behind me and in front of me so I can get back on my bike. I see many uses for it.
customer_reviews.author: Fluffy Forest

customer_reviews.title: Basic but Functional
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a big guy with some extra weight. He asked me to buy him this strap to help him stretch, since he can't reach his toes by himself. I got the 10ft bright blue strap. It's a basic strap but it works great. I think we could have easily gotten away with getting the 8ft strap instead, but having the extra 2ft of strap isn't bothersome. I also like the color, though that doesn't affect the functionality of the strap. Besides stretching your legs, the strap is also useful for stretching your arms (which is what I use it for).
customer_reviews.author: Desert Mama

customer_reviews.title: Think twice before you purchase
customer_reviews.text: If you are used to standard straps in most yoga studios you will be disappointed, as I was. I take at least 6 yoga classes a week online now that coronavirus is here, and I had only a 6-foot strap but needed something longer for a few complex poses. Yes it is long (I bought the 10-foot length) but it is thin and feels flimsy. I won't bother with the return but I wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: They look nice but can't hold much weight.
customer_reviews.text: So I got the straps for my yoga trapeze and the first time I tried using them the D-ring buckles bent completely out of shape and dumped me onto the floor. I am only 180 Lbs so suffice it to say that I am seriously disappointed in this product and will not be buying from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Law

customer_reviews.title: soft and sturdy yoga strap
customer_reviews.text: It had a weird smell when it first came out of the packaging, but the smell quickly faded away. I love the vibrant purple color, just as shown in the picture. I got the 8 feet strap, but the d-link makes it adjustable to whatever size I want. The material soft and not scratchy. This is a great piece of equipment to add to your yoga practice to assist in deepening your stretches.
customer_reviews.author: Happy person

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with the intention of starting yoga after having my first child. And, although I no longer have time to do anything by myself, I find that this is very durable as it has stood up to the test of being a lasso for my 3 year old. We use it for stretching and jumping over. Eventually, I will use it as intended and I have no doubt it will still look brand new when that time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Yates

customer_reviews.title: Works great, as expected
customer_reviews.text: Only used it a few times, but it works great- the strap holds really well and doesn't get twisted.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Happy I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: My strap came on time and looks just as it does in the picture. It's the first strap I've had and I love it, it's easy to use and helps me hold stretches and certain positions during my yoga practice. I've had it for one week so far and seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: I needed a strap for hamstring stretches and bought this one because it was easier to store in my gym bag. It's fine for that, but the style with the foot pad and loops is easier to use. This one is my backup, but definitely prefer the other one. The strap is high quality and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Science Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Great strap for stretching
customer_reviews.text: I use this strap for stretching, and it's great. The cotton material is way better than any nylon strap I've used. It's not uncomfortable to wrap around the hands to pull and hold stretches/positions for any period of time. I'm 5'6" and I find the 8' strap is perfect. I never feel limited by the length of the strap. Highly recommend. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Yoga to the next level
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these and am very pleased. The price was perfect, the colors are vibrant, and the quality of the straps look pretty good. I will be using mine for more advanced yoga practice and my husband will be using his to work on his flexibility. I was not sure if the length was correct for us or not (6 feet), but it was perfect. We are both under 6' tall, so this length was a great fit. If you are over 6' tall one of the longer lengths may be a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Quality yoga strap
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality yoga strap. I have used it for several weeks now, and it works well. Easy to adjust and stitching is secure. It's probably the best value out there! I will be purchasing a couple more for the family in the longer length and I like that I can get different colors so we can grab the right ones easily.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Not Cotton
customer_reviews.text: I bought this strap specifically because I wanted a cotton one which this says it is. It clearly is not. It may be cotton blended with something else but the something else ruins the feel of it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bunni Dot Com

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad i went with the 8ft strap
customer_reviews.text: Strap arrived as expected. I'm glad i went with the 8ft strap. I'm 5'6 and it wasn't too long. Deducted 1 star because there was some fraying in the material of the strap when I received it. Doesn't affect the usage of the yoga strap so I kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the color
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. I went off the picture for the coloring. I picked the sky blue, pictured it looks like a green mint/real color. It isnt. It is blue like the sky. The color shown as the sample color is WAY OFF. Otherwise it seems fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Cotton, but polyester cotton!
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived an hour ago. All the reviews and what I thought the seller stated was that the strap was made from cotton. Wrong information and impression. The product label states polyester cotton. I may change my review after using.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: A great prop!
customer_reviews.text: I used this on a yoga retreat and occasionally for stretching! It is very durable. I would recommend getting the biggest size, as I did not and found that it was too short for some of the exercises we were shown.
customer_reviews.author: BriPat

customer_reviews.title: Very Helpful
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a big yoga person. I used to be an athlete and hate stretching with a passion. But it’s become a necessity in my life at this point. I love this strap. It helps me stretch the areas I’m trying to stretch without causing me pain or discomfort in other places.
customer_reviews.author: Sissa

customer_reviews.title: good quality great price
customer_reviews.text: ordered this to use as the free ones available for use at my yoga studio were often taken by the time I got there. This one is very good quality and solid and... you don't have to worry about someone else's feet or armpits being on it! Good value.
customer_reviews.author: CMM

customer_reviews.title: They are awesome in helping you move your leg around when your ...
customer_reviews.text: I know these things are build as yoga straps but I found another use for them. Anyone getting a total knee replacement needs two of these. They are awesome in helping you move your leg around when your knee doesn't bend well. Just hook the strap around your fit and you can lift your leg anywhere without causing alot of pain trying to get the leg moved. Especially works great a night when you need to rollover. Just position the strap before going to sleep. When you wake up and need to move your ready! These straps are great for stretching and yoga use as well.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie Stockton

customer_reviews.title: Good value in yoga strap; lots of colors
customer_reviews.text: This is very good value in a yoga strap, and the product comes in many different colors. The D rings are high quality and work well. The strap itself is about one third thinner than my older yoga straps, but this strap is more than adequate for the task at hand.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Music Prof

customer_reviews.title: lighter weight than I expected
customer_reviews.text: It’s a Yoga strap--- long and a pretty color, but thinner and lighter weight than I expected. It get twisted when trying to feed it through the rings. I am used to and prefer a heavier yoga strap.
customer_reviews.author: Tall Bamboo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This aren’t really comfortable to use. The material is too sturdy and when I pull on it , it really hurts my hands. So now I’m just using the gym ones and that defeat the purpose of my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: kaybee

customer_reviews.title: perfect as a yoga strap!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to hold my yoga mat together and to bring it to class. Using this strap will allow me to use it for any thickness of yoga mats since the whole strap is adjustable. Sturdy material as well
customer_reviews.author: YU FAMILY

customer_reviews.title: For the price point - you can't get a better strap
customer_reviews.text: It's a yoga strap. Nothing special, but it's durable, washable, and the ring mostly holds the strap where you want it (it will tighten slightly, but I've never had it come loose). I like the bright blue color.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal G

customer_reviews.title: Great straps!
customer_reviews.text: Use these in my exercise studio for flexibility classes. They are great and durable. We hang them to store. The fabric is really soft so it feels comfortable enough to wrap an ankle without any skin irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT rely on screen colors
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the overall yoga strap, but it is not the color I expected it to be. The sky blue looks turquoise online, and when seen in person is slightly darker than baby blue. Otherwise it is as expected right out of the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: mcl

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have never owned a strap before and find them to be very beneficial to use with exercises. This one is an excellent product, it was nicely packed, and a decent price. I am very happy with this product. June
customer_reviews.author: June Hutchins

customer_reviews.title: Very useful yoga tool or prop.
customer_reviews.text: This yoga strap works well. I use it during my yoga practice and it is very useful and works almost as an extension to my arms to help me complete my poses. I do recommend this yoga strap.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great band for stretching on and off the floor!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the legnth of the band and the sturdiness. You can use it sitting or on the floor, it is great!! And it comes in lovely colors, but actuly is very durable and washable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Rita

customer_reviews.title: Finally
customer_reviews.text: Been meaning to buy one for ages and finally got around to it. Why did I wait? Very affordable. Very sturdy and will obviously last. Also very comfortable against my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Macy

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps I should upgrade to a stretchy one with loops bc this one has limitations as it's old fashioned. But we all can benefit from using the strap. Mine is a pretty pink.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice strap - not as rugged as studio straps
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice strap that gets the job done. I like that the fabric is a little soft. It's not as heavy duty as the ones in the studio which is what I was looking for but it will do.
customer_reviews.author: Unsatisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for stretching
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this yoga strap so I could work on my hemstrings and making legs more flexible. So far, it's been quite helpful. The quality of the strap is nice, it feels soft.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Very Helpful for my Yoga Goals!
customer_reviews.text: Love this new yoga strap - 6 feet is the perfect size. Also got blue which matches my mat :) This strap is super helpful for me as I re-build my yoga skills and allows me to do poses that, without the strap, I wouldn't be able to do. It will get me to my goal much quicker and safer.
customer_reviews.author: Sheli D.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty color. Sturdy. Works well. I hate using the props at the studio since so many people use them, and who knows how often they are cleaned (if at all). I would recommend for anyone practicing at home, or concerned about sharing with people of questionable cleanliness.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Flores

customer_reviews.title: Long yoga strap in great bright color
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as I only had an 8' yoga strap for my Iyengar poses. It is lone but is not as thick as my other one so I hope it will be as durable. Overall really happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: May in Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Quality Strap
customer_reviews.text: Super strong. Love the fabric. This 2-Pack Exercise Strap is budget price, but it does everything which similar exercise straps costing 3x as much.
customer_reviews.author: S. Benson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice yoga strap
customer_reviews.text: Yoga strap arrived as scheduled and is now part of my yoga items I use for a weekly class. The strap is well made, all smooth edges and the 6 foot length is perfect. Ordered the strap to match my yoga bag. Perfect color.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Z.

customer_reviews.title: Good yoga strap!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I wanted to deepen my yoga practice. I'm 5'0" and fairly flexible and should have gotten the 6' one! But I like having the extra length just in case! It's also not bright blue in person, it's more of a sky blue. It is also not full cotton but polyester cotton. I like it though. It's soft, sturdy, and should be easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and just the right length for leg stretches on a mat.
customer_reviews.text: It's well worth the price you pay. With concerns about public health, use your own straps and blocks. You'll feel 100% better about it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the money
customer_reviews.text: The length is perfect. There's a nice width to it. It isn't too wide but not too narrow either. I did notice that when I pull hard on it, it ribbons the edges of it. It's not very thick which can be a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa H.

customer_reviews.title: Great strap
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs - thick enough strap not to feel like it is cutting or digging in to my skin but not so wide that it's inconvenient or difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary A

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and folds up nicely for travel
customer_reviews.text: I am hoping that using this strap will help me increase my flexibility. Strap looks well made, sturdy and folds up nicely for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Different color
customer_reviews.text: This seems okay quality, havent tried it yet, but was disappointed with the color. It shows light aqua turquoise, but its not, its blue. I especially wanted aqua and searched for one, now it doesnt match my other gear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So worth the money
customer_reviews.text: So I really only got to use this once, but it was a great use. Nothing to do with the product of only using it once, more bc i had surgery and can't do yoga for 3 months. But I will get back to using it as soon as I can!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but its thin
customer_reviews.text: It doesnt feel good quality to the touch... The ones they have at my yoga studio are much thicker and offer much more grip and support. I thought this was going to be the same but its much thinner.. will keep it but probably wouldnt recommend not buy again
customer_reviews.author: rocio

customer_reviews.title: Just right for yoga
customer_reviews.text: The length, width and sturdiness of this strap is perfect for my yoga practice. The color is very pretty too.
customer_reviews.author: Carols

customer_reviews.title: It is exactly what I was after and I love the color which matches the mat I purchased exactly
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I was after and I love the color which matches the mat I purchased exactly. The length is good as is the heft of the strap.
customer_reviews.author: purchasing

customer_reviews.title: Great for leg stretches
customer_reviews.text: I have added a strap workout for leg stretches. The strap is very similar to the ones I use at the studio.
customer_reviews.author: Elmo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but thin!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second strap and it’s thinner than my other one, however, it doesn’t skip and works well!
customer_reviews.author: anasazicas

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and does its purpose. Baby pink, not purplish.
customer_reviews.text: The color is not as purple as it appears in the photo. It is more baby pink (which I love) but may not be what others are expecting. Sturdy, does what it's for. I purchased the 8ft one. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney F

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and sturdy. Material is nice and not too rough. Perfect size for when I am stretching (6ft strap and I am 5”4).
customer_reviews.author: Tristanie Bjazevich

customer_reviews.title: its not too wide
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked it to be wider and thicker. But, you get what you pay for, as it was cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed

customer_reviews.title: A Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I like the simplicity of the strap. My physical therapist recommended that I get a strap for stretching muscles that have given me trouble. It's really helped.
customer_reviews.author: B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Get this if you're into yoga and wanting to get deeper into your stretches. It's worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Maurio

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Has helped with my flexibility. But I wish l had gotten the shorter one. I’m 5’3 so I don’t know what I was thinking. Still works though.
customer_reviews.author: kadams05

customer_reviews.title: Great for my prenatal yoga
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Very helpful for my pregnancy when I do my prenatal yoga workouts. I’m 30 weeks and this strap really is beneficial for making those accommodations on poses that are more challenging the farther along I get. Great price and fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: Easy to manipulate
customer_reviews.text: I need this to do some leg stretches. It does not slide or cut my hand. Seems pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: sassy n gassy

customer_reviews.title: Gets those real deep stretches going.
customer_reviews.text: As someone that has done Yoga for years this is one of the first times I've actually used a strap. I'm very pleased the how deep the stretches are with the aid of a belt and this belt has solid craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nani

customer_reviews.title: Not what it is described to be
customer_reviews.text: It says on the package that is 10' long, it's not. After measuring it it is only 9' long!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Comins

customer_reviews.title: Thinner, but still effective. Rolls up and stays put
customer_reviews.text: Not as thick as my studio's strap, and it can fold in itself, but in practice it does work just fine. And it actually stores welk, since it does stay put, being more pliable. And, it's purple, and mine, so I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Cathi

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: I bought this yoga strap for my husband and almost traded it for mine when I saw it. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: jacks

customer_reviews.title: Nice belt for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I've had thicker belts but the length is perfect for my husband who can't use many belts.
customer_reviews.author: S. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality, perfect for helping my granddaughter stretch for dance and gymnastics.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly M. Spears

customer_reviews.title: Love stretching with this
customer_reviews.text: I tried a yoga strap in a class and was surprised at how much I enjoyed using it. I love the aqua color I picked out. Sturdy product. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Em

customer_reviews.title: A great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 10’ and should have gotten 8’. Ease of use would have been easier. My fault not a problem with the product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Selbitschka

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy - good price.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for yoga stretches. East to use. Sturdy! Don’t be scared if the buckle hitting your face, just be careful.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to complain about
customer_reviews.text: So my wife didn't complain about the strap, and clearly she's enjoying her yoga sessions, so I'd give it a 4 stars. Simple, useful, and comes with instructional E-book.
customer_reviews.author: George G.

customer_reviews.title: Listed as Cotton in the title and description. Received ...
customer_reviews.text: Listed as Cotton in the title and description. Received it to find the actual fiber content is Polyester Cotton. tis should be listed in the title.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent yoga strap
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed the color chartreuse was more muted and murky than it looks in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Meyers

customer_reviews.title: If you want a yoga strap, buy this one.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a yoga strap. It’s solidly put together. It’s the right length for me. I like the color. How much more can you gush about a yoga strap?!? 2 thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Karen P. Tibbals

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: My chiropractor wanted me to do some leg and hamstring stretches at home. At first I tried using 1 and even 2 connected belts. That didn’t work well. So I decided to buy this. It works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Could be a bit thicker
customer_reviews.text: I needed this length but wish it was a better quality like the Giam strap. Overall serves the purpose for the money. Nice color.
customer_reviews.author: MCB

customer_reviews.title: Great seller and product
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this product for physical therapy. It's perfect for me, because it's not stretchy material, allowing me more control of my stretches.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Thick, well made
customer_reviews.text: I am using it for posture. It's great for holding slumping shoulders back and not being a cumbersome brace. There are easy to find videos on Youtube to show you how to use it for posture.
customer_reviews.author: jill smith

customer_reviews.title: Cute strap
customer_reviews.text: Like having my own, even though not as heavy as the ones we have in class. I'd get a little longer one for some of those bound poses
customer_reviews.author: Tired Old Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. I was unsure what size to order, but 8ft seemed to be the most popular, so I went with it. Not sure what all I will do with all that strap, but I am excited to dive into yoga more and figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Lyss

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for yoga.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. High quality. Perfect length. Great buckle. Love the grey.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie L

customer_reviews.title: Yoga Strap fits the Bill
customer_reviews.text: I am quite pleased with this 6 foot yoga strap. I am currently using it in my Yoga class as well as for stretching. It is sturdy. The assortment of colors offered was appealing for me as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Jankowitz

customer_reviews.title: Rite size
customer_reviews.text: The product was the perfect size and durable I bought the 8 ft size!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Buy the bigger ones despite thinking you may not need it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 6' thinking I wouldn't need a big one...and I should have bought at least the 8' I definitely would have rather had extra strap then less. I never use it now. I do love the quality and color regardless.
customer_reviews.author: "Mr. T."

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this and glad I got this instead of use the ones at my gym
customer_reviews.author: A. Alcantara

customer_reviews.title: Yogo Strap
customer_reviews.text: It works okay. But, I would have preferred a little thicker strap.
customer_reviews.author: Bud C

customer_reviews.title: I like that the strap came within the time frame that ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that the strap came within the time frame that it said. The packaging was ripped but there was nothing wrong with the strap, it was still in its original condition. I have enjoyed using it to help stretch and yoga.
customer_reviews.author: Maria O. Bougher

customer_reviews.title: Not the same color as photo
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the sky blue. In the picture it looks really nice & vibrant. More like an aqua. But the actual one looks a bit dull. Like baby blue or periwinkle. Apart from that. I like the material.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: This product is well made and medium duty. It serves my purpose and I am pleased with the quality !
customer_reviews.author: Anoushig

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to any accessory for your yoga
customer_reviews.text: I use this strap in my daily practice and it works just perfectly. A great addition to any accessory for your yoga, pilates or ballet strengthening practice.
customer_reviews.author: Red Robbin

customer_reviews.title: Solid strap
customer_reviews.text: Like the color, haven’t needed to wash it yet not sure if it bleeds the dye out. Feels good and seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Nice strap
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using it for a while and it’s used for stretching.
customer_reviews.author: Bogart

customer_reviews.title: Great Yoga Strap!
customer_reviews.text: Very long, sturdy, nice price, good quality. Definitely helps my yoga practice and stretching. Color is more true blue than bluish-purple. Would definitely repurchase.

customer_reviews.title: It's usable. Would rather it were six feet long ...
customer_reviews.text: It's usable. Would rather it were six feet long instead of eight feet. Don't need the metal rings on one end.
customer_reviews.author: EMH

product_meta.title: REEHUT Yoga Strap (6ft, 8ft, 10ft) w/Adjustable D-Ring Buckle - Durable Polyester Cotton Exercise Straps for Stretching, General Fitness, Flexibility and Physical Therapy
feature_bullets: Available Size: 6ft, 8ft, 10ft, provide all the necessary support to keep balance.

Soft and sturdy polyester cotton material, not rub harshly, protect hands from injuring, extremely durable and will not break or lose its shape. Lightweight and portable yoga strap is easy to carry and store.
Metal D-ring buckles can be adjusted and snugly secured for various poses and alignments. Fold the loose end back on itself, tighten to your desired loop size.

Perfect for yoga, Pilates, daily exercise, or physical therapy - deepen stretches, assist with hard-to-reach poses, enhance warm ups, improve flexibility, strengthen and tone muscles, and add challenge to workouts.

Exclusive service: All REEHUT products are backed by a 30-day replacement or refund and lifetime customer support. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us by email and enjoy your exclusive service.
